channel.title: Art on Junbin Huang
channel.description: Recent content in Art on Junbin Huang

item.title: 井上直久
item.description: Naohisa Inoue (井上 直久 Inoue Naohisa, born in 1948 in Osaka, Japan) is a fantasy artist influenced by both the Surrealism and Impressionism movements. 2017.8.26, meet in M50 CREATIVE PARK. Iblard Jikan (イバラード時間 Ibarādo Jikan, literally “Iblard Time”) is a Japanese anime OVA produced by Studio Ghibli, released in Japan on DVD and Blu-ray disc on July 4, 2007, as part of the “Ghibli ga Ippai Collection”.[1] It is directed by Naohisa Inoue.
